mapper.select:
select fi.id, fi.name, fi.content, fi.class_id, fi.create_by, fi.create_date, fi.price, ci.code as classCode, ci.name as className from fees_info fi left join classes_info ci on (ci.id = fi.class_id) where 1 = 1
AND fi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{feesInfo.name},'%')
AND ci.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{feesInfo.classCode},'%')
AND ci.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{feesInfo.className},'%')
order by fi.create_date desc
